title: Plastic Management - Infographic | UNEP - UN Environment Programme
body: Chemicals & pollution action This infographic presents key information about plastics including types of plastic, plastic economy, key facts and figures as well as champion countries tackling plastic pollution.
readable_content: -2023-12-08: The text you provided is from the official website of the United Nations Environment Programme (UNEP). It includes information about their work, publications, events, and initiatives related to environmental protection and sustainability. summary:
The sentiment of the conversation about banning plastic straws is positive, as it demonstrates a commitment to environmental protection and sustainability. Banning plastic straws is a step in the right direction toward reducing plastic pollution and its impact on the environment. 

Sentiment: 0.8
